review: Absolutely sucks. Will not connect to the internet any longer. When it was working, the remote lagged terribly and you would end up in the main menu repeatedly. It doesn't turn off easily and it doesn't even have a display clock unless you download one as a separate app. I called customer service and they told me I was just out of luck and gave me a 5 dollar credit. I want my money back and I will never buy another Amazon brand item again I will put this in my pile of broken junk with my dead kindles.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The Firestick is OK, but not sure why Amazon would release something that could not cast from a computer, like the Chromecast.  Doesn't make much sense to buy this when the Chromecast does more for less money.  Not being able to cast is a huge loss of a feature, so I don't recommend until Amazon adds this functionality.
